where.label: WR1
where.expression: SELF \ Independent_property . property_type IN [ 'magnetic conductivity' , 'optical conductivity' , 'thermal conductivity' , 'electrical conductivity' ]

where.label: WR3
where.expression: ( QUERY ( ipr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'INDEPENDENT_PROPERTY_REPRESENTATION_ARM.' + 'INDEPENDENT_PROPERTY_REPRESENTATION.' + 'PROPERTY' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* ipr . rep . items | ( 'FOUNDATION_REPRESENTATION_ARM.' + 'STRING_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( it ) ) AND ( it \ string_representation_item . string_value IN [ 'conductive' , 'non conductive' , 'resistive' , 'semi conductive' ] ) ) ) = 1 ) )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( aip <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'PROPERTY_ASSIGNMENT_ARM.' + 'APPLIED_INDEPENDENT_PROPERTY.' + 'DESCRIBED_ELEMENT' ) | ( 'CONDUCTIVITY_MATERIAL_ASPECTS.' + 'CONDUCTIVITY_MATERIAL_PROPERTY_CLASS' IN TYPEOF ( aip . base_independent_property ) ) ) ) >= 1 )
